author: beforeitsnews.com
title: CSS- WIFI and Cell Phones and the Coming 5G's Are Depopulation Instruments | Beyond Science
text:
(Before It's News)
Virginia Farver was Dave’s guest for the first two hours of the show. She presented incontrovertible evidence that her concerns that should concern every America. Cell phone towers are seemingly everywhere including our schools. There are cancer clusters forming all around the country, even in some of our schools and malls. This is a shocking report!
To Listen to Dave’s stunning interview with Virigina Farver, click here
